column4: is there a program/app list somewhere off of the ubuntu 11.10 desktop?
all I see is a quick launch bar
hmm, on mine this orange area appears some of the time and i can't figure out what it's doing... it's unlike any UI I've seen
that sounds kinda like uhmm.... your mouse key is activated?
like when you move windows to the left and right of the desktop something like that appears usually
do you have a mousepad? maybe it's clicked in
does ubuntu 11.10 have a programs list ?
oh maybe that's it, but that isn't doing anything, it doesn't let me slide windows to the next desktop
yeah that's exactly what the thing looks like
so something must be triggering it
i don't believe that's what it's for grandy, its for putting a window on the right or left half of your current desktop
this must be a bad time for support :P
it looks like the regular way that the screen highligts when you want to drag a window, but it just doesn't go away
is there a way to start a program with the terminal but have the terminal close?
yeah you can put an icon on the bar that essentially does that
